Real Name: Hope Summers
Special Powers
MUTANT MESSIAH: Mastermind, Leadership. // If Hope Summers is 40 points, she is KO'd when her dial clicks past the red KO line. Protected: Pulse Wave.
OMEGA LEVEL POWER MIMICRY: FREE: Choose a character within range and line of fire and 2 standard powers they can use. Hope Summers can use the chosen powers until your next turn.
WHITE PHOENIX: STOP. Invincible. When this power is first revealed, for the rest of the game Hope Summers has [Wing], [Cosmic Energy team ability], and can't be healed above this click,
